MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY7 postcode area of Glenrothes, affecting properties in Westgates. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5pm to safely remove a generator and return the network to normal and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:45pm on Tuesday, 15 December 2020
